TEXT.English: Province Stability Overlay[NEWLINE]Color code:[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_CORE]Core area:[COLOR_REVERT] Very stable, but huge stability penalty if you don't own it[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_NATURAL]Natural / Historically stable area:[COLOR_REVERT] Stable territory, but small penalty if it's not yours[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_POTENTIAL]Potentially stable area:[COLOR_REVERT] Becomes a Natural province when settled or conquered[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_BORDER]Border / Outer / Contested area:[COLOR_REVERT] Small initial stability penalty for expanding there[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_FOREIGN]Foreign / Unstable area:[COLOR_REVERT] Large stability penalty and revolt risk for having cities there

TEXT.English: Barbarians have taken over huge swaths of your former territory, your empire is descending into civil war!
TEXT.French: Votre empire entre en guerre civile !
TEXT.German: Euer Reich steht vor einem Bürgerkrieg!
TEXT.Italian: Il tuo impero sta per cadere nella guerra civile!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Tu imperio está sufriendo una guerra civil!
TEXT.Portuguese: Seu império estourou em Guerra Civil!

TEXT.English: is descending into civil war, because of barbarian activity!
The rapid decline in your territory has dreadful consequences, your empire is descending into civil war!
TEXT.French: Votre empire entre en guerre civile !
TEXT.German: Euer Reich steht vor einem Bürgerkrieg!
TEXT.Italian: Il tuo impero sta per cadere nella guerra civile!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Tu imperio está sufriendo una guerra civil!
TEXT.Portuguese: Seu império estourou em Guerra Civil!

TEXT.English: is descending into civil war, because of recent territory losses!
As it was completely pushed out of its core area, your empire is descending into civil war!
TEXT.French: Votre empire entre en guerre civile !
TEXT.German: Euer Reich steht vor einem Bürgerkrieg!
TEXT.Italian: Il tuo impero sta per cadere nella guerra civile!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Tu imperio está sufriendo una guerra civil!
TEXT.Portuguese: Seu império estourou em Guerra Civil!
